description: Problems associated with intrusion of a "foreign" system of law including topics of jurisdiction, recognition of foreign judgments, domicile, family law, property law, contracts, torts, succession & administration of deceased estates.
prerequisites: All Level 1 LAWS courses + LAWS2111 + LAWS2112
restricted: LLB(Hons)(#64), LLB(Hons)(#48), LLB (Graduate Entry), LLB(Hons) duals and LLB dual programs.
